There are many companies and organizations working on developing AI-powered tutoring systems to improve student learning outcomes, especially in math and reading. Here are some specific ones:

**Math:**

1. **DreamBox Learning**: DreamBox is a leading provider of AI-powered math education software that offers personalized math lessons and activities for students in grades K-8.
2. **Khan Academy**: Khan Academy is a non-profit organization that provides free online education resources, including AI-powered math exercises and personalized learning dashboards.
3. **McGraw-Hill Education**: McGraw-Hill Education offers a range of AI-powered math solutions, including ALEKS, an adaptive learning system that provides personalized math instruction.
4. **Hapara**: Hapara is an AI-powered math tutoring platform that provides personalized math instruction and real-time feedback to students.

**Reading:**

1. **Amplify Education**: Amplify is a leading provider of AI-powered reading and literacy solutions, including a personalized reading platform that offers adaptive instruction and real-time feedback.
2. **Reading Assistant Plus**: Reading Assistant Plus is an AI-powered reading tutoring platform that provides personalized reading instruction and feedback to students.
3. **Hobsons**: Hobsons is a leading provider of education solutions, including an AI-powered reading platform that offers personalized reading instruction and real-time feedback.
4. **Curriculum Associates**: Curriculum Associates is a leading provider of AI-powered reading and literacy solutions, including a personalized reading platform that offers adaptive instruction and real-time feedback.

**General:**

1. **Pearson**: Pearson is a leading education company that offers a range of AI-powered tutoring systems, including AI-powered math and reading solutions.
2. **Knewton**: Knewton is a leading provider of AI-powered adaptive learning solutions, including math and reading platforms that offer personalized instruction and real-time feedback.
3. **Woot Math**: Woot Math is an AI-powered tutoring platform that offers personalized math and reading instruction, as well as real-time feedback and assessment.
4. **MIND Research Institute**: MIND Research Institute is a non-profit organization that develops AI-powered math and reading solutions, including a personalized learning platform that offers adaptive instruction and real-time feedback.

These companies and organizations are just a few examples of the many players in the AI-powered tutoring system space. I hope this helps you get started on your exploration of this exciting and rapidly evolving field!
